get.description: This function compresses files inside a folder <pathToArchive> to a ZIP-archive <pathToArchive.zip> and places it  into the folder <pathToArchive>. The value returned  is the the Uri of the ZIP-archive

parameters.name: BLOBContainer
parameters.description: Name of BLOB container in the specified Azure Storage Account

parameters.name: pathToArchive
parameters.description: Name of folder to be archived inside the BLOB container

200.description: The value returned  is the Uri of the ZIP-archive

post.description: This function compresses files inside a folder <pathToArchive> to a ZIP-archive <pathToArchive.zip> and places it  into the folder <pathToArchive>. The value returned  is the the Uri of the ZIP-archive

parameters.name: BLOBContainer
parameters.description: Name of BLOB container in the specified Azure Storage Account

parameters.name: pathToArchive
parameters.description: Name of folder to be archived inside the BLOB container

200.description: The value returned  is the Uri of the ZIP-archive
